config.fishOnDay1.name: Fish On Day 1
config.fishOnDay1.tooltip: Turn on to Trigger mail and Willy's event that gives you a fishing rod at beach'
config.mining-on-day1.name: Enable Mine Access on Day 1
config.mining-on-day1.tooltip: If enabled, the landslide blocking the mine entrance will be cleared on Spring 1, Year 1.
config.cc-on-day1.name: Enable Community Center on Day 1
config.cc-on-day1.tooltip: If enabled, the Community Center cutscene will trigger on Spring 1, Year 1 (requires entering Pelican Town).
config.pet-on-day1.name: Pet adoption on first Day
config.pet-on-day1.tooltip: Start the pet adoption cutscene the first time you walk out of the farmhouse, with no other requirements.
